title: Go-to-Market Strategy
description: How to bring Self Kernel to market â€” starting with developers.

nodes.content: Who needs this first? Developers already use multiple AI tools daily. They feel the pain of fragmented context most acutely.
Sarah's GTM advice: "Don't try to be everything. Start as a browser extension that captures thinking patterns from LLM usage. Then expand."
Prototype strategy: Build the core kernel + dashboard first. Ship as open-source. Let developers inspect and trust the data layer. Then build collection plugins.
